fields.Title of Contribution (if applicable): The gender pay gap in equity-based awards that no one is paying attention to
fields.Description/Abstract:
This article in The Conversation was republished by other media sources, including Yahoo News, Fast Company, BBC News, Salon, Philadelphia Inquirer, Idaho Business Review, Houston Chronicle, Phys.org, Boise State News, Idaho Press, The Print, National Interest, Mic, Big News Network, Warrington Newsroom, The Fashion Law, and New Orleans City Business.  

In addition, here are some statistics from The Conversation about the reach: Read 15,015 times, 269 Facebook shares, and tweeted 19 times.
